name: dnotebook
description: Jupyter-like library for JavaScript environment. It allows you to create and share pages that contain live code, text and visualizations.

scripts.build: cd src/frontend && yarn build && cd ../server && yarn build
scripts.dev: cd src/frontend && yarn dev && cd ../server && yarn dev
scripts.start: cd src/frontend && yarn && yarn build && yarn start && cd ../server && yarn && yarn build && yarn start

author: Rising Odegua <risingodegua@gmail.com>
